ReportBundle.ReportXML: <Report ReportGID="076be94a-050a-4247-9897-65d11bb4aab7" ReportUseType="2" ReportType="5" ReportName="Recipe Ingredients" Description="Crosstab of Ingredient amounts in Recipes" CreatedDT="2012-07-09T13:18:07" ModifiedDT="2015-03-26T10:30:52.4" ModifiedBy="VAS" ConcurrencyTS="AAAAAAAdczo=" ReportVersion="1" />

ReportQuery.ReportQueryText: <QueryBundle> <QueryText>from o in ( from ri in recipeIngredients {false} select new { ri.Recipe.Company.CompanyName, ri.Recipe.RecipeName, IngredientName = ri.InventoryItemName, ri.LocationName, AF_MQty = ri.AF, DM_MQty = ri.DM, FifoCostPerAF_MQty = ri.AFFifoCostPer, FifoCostPerAF_LQty = ri.AFFifoCostPerLarge, FifoCostPerDM_MQty = ri.DMFifoCostPer, FifoCostPerDM_LQty = ri.DMFifoCostPerLarge } ) {where} select new { o.CompanyName, o.RecipeName, o.IngredientName, o.LocationName, o.AF_MQty, o.DM_MQty, o.FifoCostPerAF_MQty, o.FifoCostPerAF_LQty, o.FifoCostPerDM_MQty, o.FifoCostPerDM_LQty };</QueryText> <PreQueryText>var recipeIngredients = vas.FeedWatch.Model.Entities.RecipeInstructionFactory.Instance.GetAll(null) .Where(ri => ri.Inactive == false && ri.Recipe.Inactive == false && ri.RecipeAction.RecipeActionType == vas.FeedWatch.Model.RecipeActionTypes.AddIngredient);</PreQueryText> </QueryBundle>
ReportQuery.SQLStatement:
select * from (select ri.RecipeGID ,r.RecipeName ,ii.InventoryItemName as 'Ingredient' ,li.LocationName ,dbo.GetMeasurementValue(ri.Quantity, 54) as 'AFLbs'
from RecipeInstruction ri join Recipe r on r.RecipeGID = ri.RecipeGID join InventoryItemLocation iil on iil.InventoryItemLocationGID = ri.InventoryItemLocationGID join InventoryItem ii on ii.InventoryItemGID = iil.InventoryItemGID join Location li on li.LocationGID = iil.LocationGID
where ri.Inactive = 0 and r.Inactive = 0) z where (1=1)
